snippet: As American troops get ready to speed up their withdrawal, it is clear some of it will happen under fire, as Taliban fighters try to strike in areas where the idea of Afghan-led security remains an abstraction.
abstract: Accelerated troop withdrawal from Afghanistan will likely occur under increased attacks from Taliban fighters, as insurgents focus on areas where Afghan-led security remains weak; spate of recent attacks highlights growing danger for departing soldiers.
lead_paragraph: As American troops get ready to speed up their withdrawal, it is clear some of it will happen under fire, as Taliban fighters try to strike in areas where the idea of Afghan-led security remains an abstraction.

headline.seo: U.S. Troops Leave Afghan Outposts, Still Facing Fire
headline.main: U.S. Military Faces Fire as It Pulls Out of Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: U.S. Faces Fire As It Pulls Out Of Afghanistan

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
